app_description: Text on Photos Editor Formerly Bizny allows you to add texts on pictures and videos with ease! Text 1 000 fonts available for free You can install other fonts. Supports text curve text bending and gradient text. Text size text color are changeable. Text shadow and text background are adjustable. 20 000 Background images for you to choose. Supports text on video and video trimming. Language Supports English Supports Traditional simplified Chinese Supports Japanese Thai and Vietnamese Supports Arabic Cyrillic and Greek Watermark Create your own logo. Add social watermark such as Instagram and Facebook. You can upload your own logos. Create custom text watermarks We will help you remember each of its position and save bunch of times! Collage Maker Support photo collage up to 16 images Support up to 4 video collages Provides 720P and 1080P high quality video output options. Materials Huge collections of festive and useful stickers. 3 000 awesome backgrounds. Youtube Thumbnail Provides 16:9 ratios for youtube cover. Provides exclusive 1:1 aspect ratio for Instagram posts Supports plenty other ratios such as 3:4 4:5 5:7 and 9:16 for Instagram Stories Facebook banner Facebook cover flyer and Pinterest collections! Get all you want in one second. Premium Plan A purchase will be applied to your iTunes account at the end of the trial. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled within 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime with your iTunes account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.
